name: rankpr
body: |- wceq(cfv(crnk, cpr(c0, c1)), csuc(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))))

comment: The rank of an unordered pair. Part of Exercise 30 of [Enderton] p. 207. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
